name: Pradhan Mantri Matru Vandana Yojana
description: A maternity benefit programme offered by the Government of India.
eligibility: Pregnant women and lactating mothers
benefits: Financial assistance of ₹5,000 in three installments

name: Janani Suraksha Yojana
description: A safe motherhood intervention under the National Health Mission (NHM).
eligibility: Poor pregnant women and women who have recently given birth
benefits: Cash assistance for hospital delivery and postnatal care

name: Indira Gandhi Matritva Sahyog Yojana
description: A maternity benefit programme implemented by the Ministry of Women and Child Development.
eligibility: Pregnant women and lactating mothers
benefits: Cash incentives for institutional delivery, early registration of pregnancy, and more

name: National Food Security Act
description: A law enacted by the Government of India to provide subsidized food grains to the poorest households.
eligibility: Priority households identified by the state government
benefits: Rice, wheat, and coarse grains at highly subsidized rates

name: Atal Pension Yojana
description: A government-backed pension scheme for unorganized sector workers.
eligibility: Indian citizens between 18 and 40 years of age
benefits: Pension of ₹1,000 to ₹5,000 per month after retirement

name: Ayushman Bharat
description: A health insurance scheme for economically vulnerable families in India.
eligibility: Families identified as deprived and vulnerable based on the Socio-Economic Caste Census (SECC) 2011
benefits: Coverage of up to ₹5 lakh per family per year for secondary and tertiary hospitalization care

name: Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana
description: A financial inclusion scheme to provide banking services to every household in India.
eligibility: All citizens of India
benefits: Savings account, RuPay debit card, overdraft facility, and accident insurance

name: Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Grameen Kaushalya Yojana
description: A skill training and placement programme for rural youth.
eligibility: Rural youth between 15 and 35 years of age from BPL families
benefits: Placement-linked skill training and post-placement support

name: Digital India
description: A flagship programme of the Government of India to transform India into a digitally empowered society and knowledge economy.
eligibility: All citizens of India
benefits: Access to digital infrastructure and services, improved digital literacy and skills, and job opportunities in the digital sector

name: Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana
description: A savings scheme targeted towards the parents of girl children.
eligibility: Parents or guardians of girl children
benefits: High interest rate and tax benefits

name: Balika Samridhi Yojana
description: A scheme aimed at providing financial security to the girl child.
eligibility: Families living below the poverty line with girl children
benefits: Financial assistance for education and marriage

name: Rajiv Gandhi Scheme for Empowerment of Adolescent Girls (RGSEAG) Sabla
description: A programme for the holistic development of adolescent girls.
eligibility: Adolescent girls between 11 and 18 years of age
benefits: Nutrition, health education, and life skills training

name: National Girl Child Day
description: A day celebrated in India to raise awareness about the importance of girls' education and welfare.
eligibility: N/A
benefits: N/A

name: Beti Bachao, Beti Padhao
description: A social campaign aimed at promoting girls' education and gender equality.
eligibility: N/A
benefits: Awareness and advocacy

name: Ujjawala Scheme
description: A programme for the prevention of trafficking and rescue, rehabilitation and reintegration of victims of trafficking for commercial sexual exploitation.
eligibility: Victims of human trafficking for commercial sexual exploitation and their dependents.
benefits: Rescue, rehabilitation and reintegration support.

name: Swadhar Greh
description: Aims to provide shelter, food, clothing and care to the marginalized women/girls who are in need.
eligibility: Single women and women victims of domestic violence, family tension or discord, or natural disaster who have no social and economic support
benefits: Shelter, food, clothing and care support

name: Mahila E-Haat
description: An online marketing platform for women entrepreneurs, where participants can display their products.
eligibility: Women entrepreneurs
benefits: Access to a wider market

name: Working Women Hostel Scheme
description: Aims to promote availability of safe and affordable hostel accommodation for working women.
eligibility: Working women
benefits: Safe and affordable hostel accommodation

name: Pradhan Mantri Surakshit Matritva Abhiyan (PMSMA)
description: A scheme to provide free antenatal care to pregnant women.
eligibility: Pregnant women
benefits: Free antenatal care

name: One Stop Centre (Sakhi) Scheme
description: Aims to provide integrated support and assistance to women affected by violence.
eligibility: Women affected by violence
benefits: Integrated support and assistance
